name: Mining Robot
description: Basic autonomous miner. Your first step into the belt. Best on rocky terrain.

name: Drill Mk.I
description: Cuts through rock and hard crust. Best on rocky and volcanic worlds.

name: Solar Collector
description: Converts sunlight into mining power. Most effective on sun-baked desert worlds.

name: Drill Mk.II
description: Heavy-duty drill for extreme terrain. Thrives on volcanic worlds. Requires trained crew.

name: Cryo Extractor
description: Harvests ices and frozen volatiles. Thrives on ice planets.

name: Asteroid Rig
description: Full mining platform for asteroid rock. Best on rocky bodies. Needs a team.

name: Magma Pump
description: Taps molten ore from lava flows. Built for volcanic worlds.

name: Orbital Station
description: Refinery and logistics hub. Most efficient orbiting gas giants. Crew-intensive.

name: Gas Siphon
description: Extracts valuable gases from atmospheres. Best on gas giants.

name: Deep Core Drill
description: Penetrates dense ore layers. Best on rocky planets. Requires specialist crew.

name: Geo Drill
description: Taps geothermal and magma veins. Best on volcanic worlds.

name: Stellar Harvester
description: Harvests rare minerals at scale. Strong on desert and gas giants.

name: Quantum Extractor
description: Ultra-low-temperature extraction. Best on ice worlds. Needs expert crew.

name: Void Crusher
description: Pulverizes the toughest cores. Best on rocky and volcanic. Built for the endgame.

name: Nexus Collector
description: Harvests from multiple dimensions. Works everywhere. The ultimate module. Full crew required.
